mapper.select: select tcc.classno ,tcc.courseno ,tcc.coursename ,tcc.teacherno ,tcc.teachername ,p.id ,p.testTime ,p.minuteCount ,p.score ,p.level ,p.paperno ,p.examstate from (select * from tea_cla_cou where classno = (select classno from student where studentno = #{value })) tcc left join paper p on tcc.courseno = p.courseno;
select realanswers,questionscore from question where id=#{value };
mapper.insert: insert into gradeinfo (id, studentno, classno, paperid, courseno, grade, academycode, academyName, majorcode, majorname, score, uptime) values (#{id},#{studentno},#{classno},#{paperid},#{courseno},#{grade},#{academyCode},#{academyName},#{majorCode},#{majorName},#{score},NOW());
mapper.update: update paper set examstate ='已完成' where id=#{value };
mapper.select: select Avg(score) classAvg from gradeinfo g where g.studentno=#{value } group by g.classno;
